name: windows-pac-resolver
description: Generates a pac URI, according to windows global settings, using WinHTTP API

scripts.install: autogypi && set windows_pac_resolver_msvs_version=%npm_config_msvs_version% && set npm_config_msvs_version=2015 && node-gyp configure build --msvs_version=2015 && set npm_config_msvs_version=%windows_pac_resolver_msvs_version%

author: mce
